alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Issaquena; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 3:01AM CDT until June 26 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Hinds County in central Mississippi... East central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 301 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Valley Park, or 19 miles north of Vicksburg, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Redwood around 310 AM CDT. Oak Ridge around 315 AM CDT. Youngton around 320 AM CDT. Flowers around 325 AM CDT. Edwards around 330 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
